title: How often do professional musicians make significant errors in live performances? - Quora

response.answer_text: You would have to define ‘significant’ All musicians make errors. They are human. Covering it up is part of the game . You just play on. It rock bands, mistakes are made all the time, and it’s covered up by the loud amplifiers, screaming vocals etc. If your’e a concert pianist or fist violin in an orchestra, making a mistake is a bigger deal. rehearse, practice, rehearse, practice, and repeat.
